definition[0]: in shares and bonds, another name for PAR VALUE
example[0]: Under a new law, Swiss companies will be able to lower the nominal value of their shares to 10 Swiss francs from 100.
definition[1]: the nominal value of a BANKNOTE is the amount printed on it
example[1]: A system of banknotes is economical when the nominal value of each note is about double that of the lesser note.
